We believe that open environmental information and shared knowledge is paramount to ensuring a vital Chesapeake Bay.

  • About
  • Resources

About

Viable Industries is a value-driven digital creative studio

We’re passionate about empowering organizations with web and mobile technologies that use their data to spark public engagement and fuel smarter problem-solving. We believe information transparency is the foundation for effective public engagement, thoughtful decision making, and meaningful social change.

Because of what we believe, openess and transparency lead our decisions as an organization. This starts with how we operate our organization and shines through the software and other technology we support and build.

Organizational Transparency

We believe strong relationships are built on communication, honesty, and trust.

Learn more about our vision of transparency

Open Data and Software

We’ve built our organization on open data and open source software.

Learn more about our contributions

Come Work With Us

We currently have no open positions, but you can still send us your resume.

Chesapeake Commons is a resource that enables small watershed organizations, foundations, and government to turn raw data into knowledge that sparks information transparency, public engagement, and effective Bay restoration action.

We are located at 1875 Connecticut Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20009. Our offices are located at WeWork's Washington, DC innovative working space.
